attributes.action: Force more resources toward catching the Cat Killer (Croydon).
attributes.background: The Croydon Cat Killer still not been caught despite numerous Children loosing their beloved pets, this could affect children for life, as well as Elderly loosing their only company and others loosing a living breathing member of the family, Please Force more resources toward catching monster.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the local police force. Local policing issues in Croydon are the responsibility of the Metropolitan Police Service.

The Metropolitan Police Service is the responsibility of the London Mayor's Office for Policing and Crime (MOPAC). MOPAC is overseen by the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
